reviews.review: muito bom jogo desafiador e hardCOREEEE!!!
Fun game. Play with friends as survivors and teabag scrub killers.

You play as one of the lone guardians armed with a melee weapon and a unique set of skills that you use to try and stop the 4 identical quadruplet botanist students from escaping and causing mass distress among your fellow guardians. You do this by offering them on meat hooks to the protector of all servers, also known as the "Entity". If you win you bask in the woes of the cruel fools who taunted you, blinded you, and crushed your head with pallets as they claim their capture by the "Entity" and you as "unfair". If you lose they will taunt you for eternity or until you leave the lobby. Then they will move on to their next victim. 
You must stop them at all costs!
Or become one.
The scariest part about this game is how it has positive reviews

Ein wirklich sehr gutes Spiel, auch wenn man etwas √úbung braucht. Es ist ein bisschen schade, dass "besonders" gute Teammates manchmal die Runde versauen, aber das ist bei Multiplayerspielen eher die Regel. Es ist vielleicht noch wichtig zu sagen, dass der Normalpreis lange nicht das ganze Spiel beinhaltet, da es zu gro√üen Teilen von DLCs ausgemacht wird.

Gets worse with every OP killer update. Dev's don't want to listen to horror community that plays even though the killers themselves even admit that most of the killer characters are simply OP and broken. Killers are never nerfed, only survivors. Killer buff, survivor nerf. Killer buff, survivor nerf. Killer buff, survivor nerf. WTF? That's why repeat killers play it, not because they're Scream fans or Evil Dead fans etc. BeHaviour loves to Hex Ruin their games and render them to be pointless. I'm uninstalling this even after investing money on add-ons like Ash VS Evil Dead - such a waste. Their new game DeathGarden is almost as bad. Just a matter of time before they kill that game too. In fact - stay away from this publisher, at least until they get their heads out of the sand.

DeathGarden - BloodHarvest has been removed from Steam and servers shut off. This developer is trash - they have no clue on how to balance a game no matter how much potential the Intellectual Property (IP) holds. 

Hit-box issues remain to be fixed....

Fun game! Addicting and overall a good time. Fuck ton of bugs and a bit infuriating at times but all games are to a certain extent, still fun in my opinion! Worth the buy for sure especially when its on sale for $10!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Edit 2/13/2021 After 2850 hr in this game putting up with literal garbage updates including trash hitboxes, nerfs on top of nerfs for both killer and survivor some of which where unnecessary and uncalled for, i uninstalled this game immediately after this last 4.5 patch. 

It is completely unplayable for the survivor side which is mostly what i play. The devs gave us a slap on the face after we seriously disliked the change in the UI and the movement in the PTB. They basically shit all over us and put it up anyway and said quote "Since there was't that much feedback".

NO ONE asked of a UI change, no one asked for movement change. BHVR cant stop being greedy little fucks and catering to the wrong crowd. The old people that play ur game constantly, that buy your cosmetics and get others to buy your shitty game feel like their words are meaningless.

Im so incredibly sad, I love this game, the old game. I don't recognize it anymore.

RIP.
this game suck do not play, its all about luck, just stay away

I bought this game just because i wanted to play with a friend but then i realized that this game is the best online horror experience you will get. Both sides are fun to play and if you like to shit your pants every game as a survivor then i highly reccomend it for you.

This game is in a tossup for me sadly. TLDR i would not buy this game

This game has issues with its core balancing and how the main gimmic of perks bring more issues to the table then it can solve. Perks now overlap eachother in usefulness and in niches. It's so bizzare on how far they have gotten since with every update while the perks may be fresh, only become meta due to how much better they are. The issue with this is it is all DLC and when buying the DLC you dont even get what you paid for right away. You must grind in order to unlock the perks then be able to even earn them on others, needing even more bullshit grinding.

4/10 - I want this game to be better

This game is great for anyone who is into teamwork, scares, occasional bullshit such as hook/generator camping Hags, and slicing up people's backs up, this game is perfect for you!
This is a very amazing game it takes some practice and determination to get good but its worth it. This game always has me on the edge of my seat when i am a survivor!

this and the hunt showdown are probably the best choices for horror multiplayer but deathgarden might go up there with them if it gets enough time to update and become more fleshed out.

while this game didn't start out very good but it's evolved into a very fun experience, but to be fair some of the animations are not very good and there are bugs here and there but overall I recommend it
Very spoopy, I like that it has killers from very well known horror movies and lore

the game is pretty fun but it has a few major flaws that kinda make me not wanna play it sometimes

latency: connection is doodoo sometimes and i know by now it isnt my internet and its just kinda meh

hitboxes: theyre a joke- like actually. theyre extremely inconsistent, from too small to too big and it makes the game feels extremely clunky getting a hit connected to you that shouldnt have hit

ranks and players (less of the games problem): i am now rank 8 or 9 i believe iirc and the game feels way too stressful tbh and the killers are all toxic. the amount of tunneling and facecamping the higher the ranks u go is absurd and i hate it, like i actually cant play the game sometimes and it makes me so mad- and the players that DO THIS are NOT punished, at all- it's stupid.

but like its still fun buy it lol

I first tried the game during a free to play weekend with some friends. That's a plus in itself cause you can test the game out before purchase. Even if I've seen some Youtubers play it, I had no clue what to expect or do so in a way I played it blind. Once I figured out the basics, I was hooked (literally). It was thrilling to find a game that was sometimes unpredictable. You'd never know how the person playing killer would act. Every game was different too depending on what type of style you wanted to play or how the other survivors contributed as well. I loved that it was also a multiplayer game since I always hated playing by myself. Not to mention, I've met a lot of amazing gamers that I've become great friends with through this game. 
It has some bugs here and there but when my friends and I encounter it, it's more hilarious than upsetting. From my perspective, the developers are pretty active in adding new characters and concepts to the game which is nice. They normally fix any major issues as well when it needs to be so the game may only improve from here. Above all, this has easily became one of my all-time favorite games that I'll probably never stop playing. I would highly recommend it for purchase cause it's definitely well worth the money. If you do decide to buy it, well... I can't wait to see you in the fog!
